name: Nichathan's Solitaire Pack
description:
When completed, this game pack will include 5 typical solitaire  games and a special Nichathan Gaming creation which fuses BlackJack and War.

Currently, the game is in Beta with only 3 games: Klondike Solitaire, Pyramid Solitaire and TriPeaks Solitaire.

While donations are appreciated, the game can be downloaded for free.
